---
title: Template (Org)
description: Organisational template covering Govern, Respond, and Recover
---

This is a fill-in template covering the organisational-level NIST CSF 2.0 functions: Govern, Respond, and Recover. Copy this structure when applying the methodology to your organisation. For guidance on what to put in each section, see the corresponding category page linked at the top of each template page.

Identify, Protect, and Detect are assessed per component using the [Template (Component)](/docs/templates/component).

| Function | Categories |
|----------|------------|
| [Govern](/docs/templates/complete/govern) | Organizational context, risk strategy, roles, policy, oversight, and supply chain risk |
| [Respond](/docs/templates/complete/respond) | Incident management, analysis, reporting, and mitigation |
| [Recover](/docs/templates/complete/recover) | Recovery plan execution and recovery communication |
